item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 20, 2022 Today's Verse 1 John 2:28 [28] And now, little children, abide in him, so that when he appears we may have confidence and not shrink from him in shame at his coming. Today's Memory Verse Romans 12: 1-2 - I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship.
